item.title: Chromebook Sales still have a lot of Potential
item.description: Recent market research predicts that Chromebook sales will increase by 27 percent in 2015, an impressive number but with room upwards.

item.title: Microsoft's Desperate Attempt to Discredit Chromebooks
item.description: Microsoft recently published a video on YouTube (now private) to spread some FUD against Chromebooks based on misinformation and unproven statements.
